resources.string: The generated sheet music will be saved in the /Picture/SheetMusic directory.

The "Drummer Sight Reading App" is designed to help novice to advanced drummers practice sight reading using 7 difficulty levels of randomly generated sheet music. You, as the drummer, are allowed to select from 6 different time signatures, tempo varying from 30 to 200 beats per minute, flams, accents, rolls, triplets, 16th triplets, and more to practice from. The app also allows you to practice different rudiments like flam taps, para diddles, 5 stroke rolls, and more as these are randomly sprinkled into the music. Each piece of sheet music will be different providing a truly new practice session each time. The app also has a metronome built in so you don\'t have to use your own. To contact the developer of this app, please send all inquiries to tidisventures@gmail.com or visit http://tidisventures.com
